1214250.name: TIGER SYMBOLIC LINK KNIFE
1214250.description:
About
The Software is a program to create symlinks,

A symbolic link is a file-system object that points to another file system object.
The object being pointed to is called the target.
Symbolic links are transparent to users;
the links appear as normal files or directories,
and can be acted upon by the user or application in exactly the same manner.

Symbolic links can save you a lot of time,
The Software is a program to create symlinks,
which may help something like manage your documents easy.
